name: slav
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a member of any of the Eastern European races of people who speak Slavic languages
of or relating to Slavs, or their languages or cultures: She is a Doctor of Philosophy who specialized in Germanic and Slav languages. His time in Eastern Europe left him fascinated with the Slav world.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a harsh opponent of Slav nationalism.The mass of the peasants retained their Slav culture and language.Roughly two-thirds of the nation's inhabitants are Slav.
